Room.Name: Tower Castle Roof Battlements
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the roof of Prince Rutger's Tower Castle, behind the battlements.
Room.LongDescription: There are archery nooks and catapult launching ramps along here, and in the distance there is a hot oil station. A huge sled of rocks, held in place by a net, stands nearby. Looks like the fighting forces are ready for any kind of a siege.
